post.body: ha.... heard you ran into my wife last night... you night owl, you. so is wed, thu, or fri cool?
fo sho! wednesday, thursday, or friday night are best.
you know what's sad? i didn't even see this til a month after you posted it. lol. Hi, Cameron.
happy non-offensive day of winter
your kid's getting big! http://twitpic.com/zh3o
sorry bro... Thought we made the rounds and caught everybody... Love ya man. Have an awesome new year!
hell ya they do. dude! i thought that was you. i never wanted to ask because I couldn't remember your last name. lol
did you get the file with the time on it? i sent it on sunday afternoon, i think. to your gmail.
yeah, of course we're cool man. i've just been a bit busy with work cuz of short weeks and such.
dude! that sounds SO good right now. but w/ a grande coffee instead of the iced coffee
nope. oh well....
the Niners are making me nervous. *sweating* wonder if they can pull this off, cuz that would be cool.
busy day today: went to church, came home to watch kids while wife naps & then goes to rehearsal, dinner w/ the in-laws, etc.
49ers vs. Dolphins. go niners.
watching Gattaca on hulu.com. love this movie. oh, and twitteriffic stopped working on my iphone. hmm...
getting caught up on The Office... I always feel so bad for Toby.
Getting the kids in bed. One down, one to go.
At work getting things ready for this weekend.
Cold today.... Took the kids to the park and we all froze. 50 degrees and windy makes it feel like 40. I'm questioning my flip-flops.
relaxing at home... thinking about what to do today with my family. it's kinda cold and foggy... hmm.
done with music mode. back to design.
switching into music mode. charting out some christmas arrangements.
working on trying to figure out what to do with a design.... it's close, but needs a little more love
contemplating. relaxing. and the like.
My phone is gonna die and my charger is at work. Email or call my home if you need me
teaching the ways of guitar kung-fu.
Man today is going fast.
web stuff and sermon branding. @dbunk & @patzkowsky - if i can get my scanner to work, i sketched out a concept for you guys
doing the usual saturday thing of getting stuff ready for church this weekend. ... I'm playing acoustic for our services. unplugged weekend
Me and Anna http://twitpic.com/ufe7
Me and Sam http://twitpic.com/ufdl
Bathtime: http://twitpic.com/uf4j
2 minutes till this file finishes uploading, then i'm ghost.
yeah, i haven't had lunch yet.... starting to get hungry. but there's too much to do.
Weezer's Christmas EP is so cool. I love it.
morning came too soon... so tired.
new Nada Surf!!?!?!? how did I not know? liking what I'm hearing. :)
Christmas. Christmas. Christmas. Christmas. :) :) :) :)
Too. Much. Fudge. * i shall resist.*
Ok.... Today, you need to slow down. Tomorrow, why do you have to be Friday? Let's talk about this...
Just spent 3 hours programming a pod x3 live for a friend. Fun but tedious and tricky. Think this unit is a little glitchy...
i seriously love Matthew Perryman Jones' music. SO good.
polishing up the final design pieces of our christmas series.
wow... today is on adrenaline or something, cuz' it's zooming by.
one meeting down, and, oh, like 12 to go.
meeting for our Christmas program... getting all the details coordinated. fun.
Benjamin Button was great. Rocked out to some Django all evening. Great dinner from my wife. Watching 24: Redemption now.
About to watch Benjamin button with my wife... As soon as I can get thru the concession stand
chilling at home before I head in to work for a few hours.
yeah, think I'm running out of steam... gonna go home a little early. a couple of emails, then I'm done.
my stomach is making weird noises.
frustrating myself... I keep using my Mac keyboard shortcuts on my PC (vmware), and the opposite, too. Cross-OS'ing is no fun.
ugh. it feels like Monday.
Sam and the vacuum: http://twitpic.com/ytoa
man, Sam (18 months old) is moody today. chill out, dude.
My Top 10 Top 10 Blog Posts of 2008: http://pursuingok.blogspot.com
gonna go home in just a lil bit. happy new year, all!
Trying to get stuff done.
uh oh... local news station is now following me. not sure i'm news-worthy, but hey, whatever. i better do something interesting.
How can I pray for you today? DM me or just reply.
